title.rendered: Compandent New MELPe Implementation on STMicroelectronics STM32H743 was Released!

content.rendered:
Compandent released a highly optimized MELPe implementation using IAR Embedded Workbench for Arm on STM32H743 32-bit ARM® Cortex®-M7 400MHz MCUs by STMicroelectronics.  The MELPe implementation was developped, optimized, and runs using the NUCLEO-H743ZI2 STMicroelectronics Development Board.

https://www.melp.org/melpesw/

Compandent MELPe Implementation Using IAR Systems on STM32H743 32-bit ARM® Cortex®-M7 400MHz MCUs by STMicroelectronics

Compandent released a highly optimized MELPe implementation using IAR Embedded Workbench for Arm on STM32H743 32-bit ARM® Cortex®-M7 400MHz MCUs by STMicroelectronics.  The MELPe implementation was developped, optimized, and runs using the NUCLEO-H743ZI2 STMicroelectronics Development Board.

excerpt.rendered: Compandent released a highly optimized MELPe implementation using IAR Embedded Workbench for Arm on STM32H743 32-bit ARM® Cortex®-M7 400MHz MCUs…
